model.name: Looper
model.description: Loops a given source (or a set of sources) continuously.

param.name: gain
param.description: The volume (loudness) of the audio produced by the model.

param.name: pan
param.description: Left/Right panning (in degrees) of the position of the source with respect to the listener

param.name: playSpeed
param.description: Speed of playback of the source. Affects both pitch and tempo.

param.name: riseTime
param.description: Rate of increase of Play Speed. Affect how quickly Play Speed rises to a set value.

param.name: decayTime
param.description: Rate of decrease of Play Speed. Affect how quickly Play Speed decays to a set value.

param.name: maxLoops
param.description: Maximum number of times the source will loop. (-1 indicates loop forever)
